roleset.name: make wrong

role.descr: mode-specific description of act of going wrong

example.name: fishing metaphor
example.text: [*] Unknown to Mr. Tharp, he had fouled his net on a special IRS project to catch catfish farmers and haulers inclined to cheat on their taxes.
example.arg: on a special IRS project to catch catfish farmers and haulers inclined to cheat on their taxes

example.name: baseball metaphor
example.text: John fouled off the right-side bleachers.

roleset.note: So many possible meanings, so few argument structures!

example.name: BOLT corpus example, ambergris is expensive component of perfume! yummy!
example.text: The stuff the eject is fouled and gross , but after it floats in the sun , on the ocean , for many years , it becomes ambergris - worth a small fortune too .....
